description: Describes the number of layers and apps in a specified stack, and the number of instances in each state, such as running_setup or online. Required Permissions: To use this action, an IAM user must have a Show, Deploy, or Manage permissions level for the stack, or an attached policy that explicitly grants permissions. For more information about user permissions, see Managing User Permissions.

nested_items.name: StackSummary
nested_items.description: A StackSummary object that contains the results.

nested_items.name: StackId
nested_items.description: The stack ID.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The stack name.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The stack's ARN.

nested_items.name: LayersCount
nested_items.description: The number of layers.

nested_items.name: AppsCount
nested_items.description: The number of apps.

nested_items.name: InstancesCount
nested_items.description: An InstancesCount object with the number of instances in each status.

nested_items.name: Assigning
nested_items.description: The number of instances in the Assigning state.

nested_items.name: Booting
nested_items.description: The number of instances with booting status.

nested_items.name: ConnectionLost
nested_items.description: The number of instances with connection_lost status.

nested_items.name: Deregistering
nested_items.description: The number of instances in the Deregistering state.

nested_items.name: Online
nested_items.description: The number of instances with online status.

nested_items.name: Pending
nested_items.description: The number of instances with pending status.

nested_items.name: Rebooting
nested_items.description: The number of instances with rebooting status.

nested_items.name: Registered
nested_items.description: The number of instances in the Registered state.

nested_items.name: Registering
nested_items.description: The number of instances in the Registering state.

nested_items.name: Requested
nested_items.description: The number of instances with requested status.

nested_items.name: RunningSetup
nested_items.description: The number of instances with running_setup status.

nested_items.name: SetupFailed
nested_items.description: The number of instances with setup_failed status.

nested_items.name: ShuttingDown
nested_items.description: The number of instances with shutting_down status.

nested_items.name: StartFailed
nested_items.description: The number of instances with start_failed status.

nested_items.name: StopFailed
nested_items.description: The number of instances with stop_failed status.

nested_items.name: Stopped
nested_items.description: The number of instances with stopped status.

nested_items.name: Stopping
nested_items.description: The number of instances with stopping status.

nested_items.name: Terminated
nested_items.description: The number of instances with terminated status.

nested_items.name: Terminating
nested_items.description: The number of instances with terminating status.

nested_items.name: Unassigning
nested_items.description: The number of instances in the Unassigning state.
